name: Bullets and Deadly Bubbles
description:
Grab your pistol and a shovel, or the bubble gun or any of the other crazy weapons at your disposal. Dash between rooftops and fight your way through the endless waves of enemies. 

"Bullets and Deadly Bubbles" is a silly endless wave  FPS. Collect special weapons and refill your health between rounds. Kill as many enemies as you can to set an unbeatable high score!

Controls:

  • LEFT MOUSE - Fire revolver
  • RIGHT MOUSE - Fire Special Weapon
  • WASD - Run
  • SPACE - Jump
  • F - Dash

Credits:

  • Erik Gustafsson
  • Johan Hyberg
  • Selina Nordin
